channel.title: Help
channel.description: How can I make it so admins can't ban cos and also how do I make it so nobody can ipban or ban the owner looked everywhere. And also does anybody no the emotes server sided for new whip on rs

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

If you want to make it so admin’s/other people can’t ban/IP ban, just wrap your command in this ‘if’ statement:

if (playerName.equals("Your Name")) { }

Then replace ‘Your Name’ with your character name.

The new whip emote isn’t available in the 317/377 cache (unless you ‘hardcode’ it). Just google/ search moparscape for something like ‘317 + add new whip emote’ if you want to find out how to add it.

Read full topic
